medium: Lacquer, gold, silver, mother-of-pearl on wood
title: Writing box (suzuribako)
marks: Signature inside lid LLC, in red
description: deep rectangular box with beveled edges; brown lacquer background with bamboo leaf motif painted in gold; a few bamboo leaves are made of mother-of-pearl inlay; black lacquer interior
creditline: The John R. Van Derlip Fund; purchase from the collection of Elizabeth and Willard Clark
